results.name: KLA Corporation Common Stock
results.description: KLA designs and manufactures yield-management and process-monitoring diagnostic and control, or PDC, systems for the semiconductor manufacturing industry. The systems are used to analyze the manufacturing process at various steps in a semiconductor's development. The firm's laser-scanning products are used for wafer qualification, process monitoring, and equipment monitoring. KLA also provides inspection tools and systems for optical metrology and e-beam metrology.
